section.p: The audio module is enabled by default. You can call this method to disable it.
section.note:
This method resets the internal engine and takes some time to take effect. Agora recommends using the following APIs to control the audio module separately:
: Enables or disables the microphone to create a local audio stream.
: Enables or disables loopback audio capture.
: Publishes or stops publishing the local audio stream.
: Subscribes to or unsubscribes from and plays remote audio streams.
: Subscribes to or unsubscribes from and plays all remote audio streams.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel. It remains effective after leaving the channel.
